## Bio

I am a Master of Public Health student at the Bloomberg School of Public Health and currently between my third and fourth years of medical school at the University of Iowa. My research interests include infectious disease, global health, and women’s health. Beyond my academic and clinical training, I enjoy reading and traveling 📚 ✈️.

## Background and This Class
I previously earned a master’s degree where I focused on analyzing survey data and conducting statistical analyses, but I have limited programming experience. In this class, I hope to strengthen my programming skills, particularly in ways that can be applied to public health research and practice.
